title: DUNK MASTER VI
body:
Vi is one of the original champions that had a dunk style ULT. And yet two champions got the skin before she ever got a chance. Ivren DOES NOT have any ability that has a dunk style, Daisy barely does a dunk move. Vi and Darius have ults that look like you are literally dunking on the enemy champ.
Vi deserves a chance to have a dunk master skin. Riot please help a sister out. {{champion:254}}

replies.body: Is it weird that I first read the title as "drunk master Yi"?

> [{quoted}](name=gElva,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=35qoUxOY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-09T09:04:04.673+0000)
>
> Is it weird that I first read the title as "drunk master Yi"?
i read it this way too xD

Hey!
{{champion:86}} has been waiting for such a skin for way too long.
Ivern dunks people with his allies.
